title: x/tools/cmd/tip: stopped updating (timed out waiting for process)
body:
```
side=a
current=9e040979bd07acfcd93d59667b5f51c6aa183047-86ad1193da6aba71355e71191641b9cfb26daa67
error=waitReady: timed out waiting for process at localhost:8082: Get http://localhost:8082/search?q=FALLTHROUGH: dial tcp [::1]:8082: getsockopt: connection refused
```

Maybe tip needs to have some sort of alert when a side doesn't build properly.

/cc @bradfitz @adg
